channel.title: CVE Feed for Bradley B. Dalina -- Image Tag Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Bradley B. Dalina -- Image Tag Manager

item.title: CVE-2024-22160|2024-01-31T18:07:35.209Z -- Bradley B. Dalina -- Image Tag Manager
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Bradley B. Dalina Image Tag Manager allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Image Tag Manager: from n/a through 1.5.
